job_title: Family Nurse Practitioner in Toledo, OH
pros: Great work climate, great benefits, opportunity for advancement
Good PTO Good coworkers Some good employees
cons: Terrible benefits. Terrible admin- you can tell who the admin is- the only ones with positive reviews Treat employees terribly- terrible turnover! Terrible insurance. Terrible!

job_title: Chief Analytics Officer in Lima, OH
pros: You make a difference in the lives of patients every day. Although the work is hard, the rewards are worth it. The administration is supportive of growth, education, opportunity and keeping patients at the center of decisions. I love the variety of work and the continuous growth of the organization. Awesome workplace if your soul matches the culture!
cons: Not a good fit for anyone that doesn't believe in the mission of taking care of patients.

pros: Management is straightforward and kind, job training is clear, opportunity for growth in the company
cons: 90 day probationary period before sign on.

review_title: Great Place to Work with Opportunity for Growth
job_title: Director of Human Resources in Bryan, OH
pros:
Great place to work with opportunity for growth and promotion. 
Great benefits; including competitive compensation, medical, dental and vision insurance and retirement.
cons: There are no cons that I see.

pros: Christmas Bonuses would be the only pro.
cons: Not sure where to begin because there are so many cons. Unexperienced management and staff. Low Morale and a very high employee turnover. This place is full of drama and very stressful. I regret wasting my time working for a company that doesn't value their employees.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) in Lima, OH
pros: Coworkers are like family. Great teamwork.
cons: None, I enjoyed my time there and enjoyed my patients.

pros: PTO was well compensated for the drama and poor management
cons: Management was awful and very greedy

review_title: Great mission and vision/ Terrible employer to work for
pros: Helping people in need, most co- workers work together as a team, facilities are very nice, great hours.
cons: Adminstration team are a group of bullies,  COO wishes to control every aspect the organization.  She is of touch the employee base is very ineffective her position, absolutely no communication of change policy or direction, lower pay than the competitors, not everyone is treated equally, HPWO does NOT value employees,  no employee engagement, administration only cares about the numbers (which are altered to fit their agenda)
